gEscape Struct Reference

#include <gtokenize.h>


Data Fields

char escchar
 Character to look for after a slash.
char replacechar
 Character to replace the two characters with.

Detailed Description

Escape sequence definition object.

An escape character is a character following a backslash (\) in a string literal. If the escape character is not found in the parms escape list, both characters are replaced with the character following the slash. If the gIgnoreEscapes flag is enabled in the gTokenParms passed to the tokenizer, these will be ignored all together.
